sense.def:
Kar se zgodi
often
, se zgodi velikokrat ali pa se dogaja večino časa.

seg.quote: We often get very wet cold winters here.
It's not often you meet someone who's really interested.

T.def: Izraz se uporablja v vprašalnih in povednih stavkih o pogostosti dogajanja.

seg.quote: How often do you need to weigh the baby?
John came as often as he could.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da se nekaj zgodi
every so often
, to pomeni, da se dogaja občasno.

seg.quote: Every so often, she spends a weekend in London.
